comments.author: BitSwapNow
comments.body: You can try our service Bitswapnow. We offer a ton of currency exchange options and the ability to buy with your bank card. Depending on certain transactions and or criteria you may need to provide extra personal details to combat fraud and KYC requirements. No sign up is required and we do not ask for any personal details unless a transaction is highly suspicious or deemed as risky by our 3rd party.

comments.author: BitSwapNow
comments.body: It depends on some certain criteria. We use a 3rd party service for risk and fraud detection. Most crypto purchase options with credit or debit will require some types of verification to prevent credit card fraud. This is pretty standard as they are considered high risk transactions. You can read more about it in our FAQ and KYC sections of the support pages. You can always try and if it does come up then you dont have to proceed as well.
